error_details.explanation: Incomplete calculation. The term 'remaining_lollipops' (value: 6) was omitted from the operation.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 43
He had 5 Kit-Kats and had 3 times that amount in Kisses so he had 5*3 = <<5*3=15>>15 Hershey kisses
He had 10 Baby Ruths and half that amount in Reese Peanut butter cups so he had 10/2 = <<10/2=5>>5 Reese Peanut Butter cups
He had 11 lollipops and gave 5 to his sister so he now had 11-5 = <<11-5=6>>6 lollipops
When you add up all of the candy, he had 5 Kit-Kats, 15 Hershey kisses, 10 Baby Ruths, 5 Reese cups and 8 Nerds so 5+15+10+5+8 = <<5+15+10+5+8=43>>43 pieces of candy
